name: Robin Muller
occupation: Private Contractor; Drilling Consultant/Well Control Engineer
description: I enjoy the usual stuff – laughing and talking, listening to music, going for a walk, reading, movies. I am physically affectionate, and friendly. I am a real person – thoughts, opinions, ideas, feelings. I am proud of how far I’ve come in my life. I’m an open and accepting person, but I know that I do not want people that do things excessive.I’m looking for some one who’s loving and caring passionate who also have the sense of humor and she knows what he want in life. Some one with open heart, who will care about and my life and social. I am searching for someone who shares the following qualities with me. Thoughtful, loving, goal oriented, along with sense of humor. I love to laugh and smile.
